name: Achmad Hanafy
title: Mobile & Frontend Developer
about: As an experienced Frontend and Mobile Developer, I have a proven track record in building dynamic and responsive web and mobile applications. My expertise encompasses both front-end and back-end development, enabling me to design, implement, and maintain comprehensive application solutions seamlessly

skills.name: Frontend Development
skills.description: Experienced in building modern, responsive, and scalable web applications with a strong focus on performance and user experience. Skilled in JavaScript, TypeScript, and React-based frameworks (Next.js). Proficient in implementing UI/UX with Tailwind CSS, Redux for state management, and Storybook for component-driven development.

skills.name: Mobile Development
skills.description: Specialized in cross-platform mobile app development using React Native and Flutter, delivering high-quality apps for both iOS and Android. Experienced with Dart, native Android, and Swift/UIKit for iOS. Skilled in building scalable architectures, custom component libraries, and integrating APIs to ensure smooth user experiences across devices.

skills.name: Others
skills.description: Strong background in tooling, and development workflows. Experienced in Express JS and Node.js for building APIs, Firebase for application setup, and Git for version control in collaborative environments. Also skilled in publishing reusable NPM libraries to streamline development across projects.

work_experience.responsibilities: Developed and published mobile apps per client requirements, implementing Figma UI designs, integrating RESTful APIs, and managing the full app lifecycle (build, test, deploy). Ensured seamless performance across devices, worked with React Native, Flutter, and native iOS (Swift, UIKit).

contribution.name: Langit Musik Lite
contribution.description: Lite version of music streaming app

contribution.name: Nuun
contribution.description: Smart CCTV app for device connection & control

work_experience.responsibilities: Led end-to-end React Native app development for iOS and Android, implementing new features, revamping apps, and building a custom component library (CLI & Expo). Integrated Unistyles for dynamic theming, created Storybook playgrounds, and collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile (Jira) to deliver high-quality features on time.

contribution.description: Marketplace for crop buyers in Malaysia

work_experience.responsibilities: Led frontend development for web and mobile apps, aligning workflows with business needs, integrating with backend services, participating in SIT & UAT testing, and delivering feature revamps and bug fixes.

contribution.name: One By IFG
contribution.description: Insurance app for product purchase & tracking

contribution.name: Life by IFG (Web)

contribution.name: LifeSpace

work_experience.responsibilities: Built responsive web apps using GatsbyJS, Material UI, and TailwindCSS, developed REST APIs with Node.js & Express, managed databases with TypeORM, and migrated legacy systems from CodeIgniter to GatsbyJS.

projects.name: Life by IFG
projects.description: Insurance application official digital hub for IFG Life customers, enabling easy policy management. Users can view buy insurance subsription inside app, track insurance benefit due dates, and access information on any restructured transferred policies conveniently

projects.name: Farmbyte Grow
projects.description: Seller Center platform for farmers to maximize profit and sell their crops to Farmbyte company. It provides crop advisory, farming logs, transparent market prices, and schedules harvest collection/logistics to optimize farm management and sales.

projects.name: One By IFG
projects.description: One by IFG is an integrated platform offering various Insurance, Health, and Investment products. It provides instant registration, 24/7 access, and digital consultation to meet users' financial and health needs.

projects.name: Astraotoshop
projects.description: Mobile marketplace for buying genuine car and motorcycle spare parts online offically by Astra Otoparts. It offers a vast product listing, vehicle-specific search, and booking services for professional installation

projects.name: LifeSpace
projects.description: This is an administrative portal used to manage user access and security within a system. Key functions include defining user roles (e.g., administrator, manager, user), assigning granular permissions to those roles, and controlling which users have the authority to view or modify sensitive data and system features.

projects.name: BeamSpace
projects.description: This administrative portal is dedicated to overseeing all operational aspects of a physical warehouse or logistics center. It enables staff to manage inventory levels, track the movement of stock, optimize storage locations, process inbound and outbound shipments, and monitor overall performance and efficiency metrics.

projects.name: RN Adaptbyte
projects.description: Custom RN component library for Farmbyte

projects.name: Sagara AI ( Gemini API )
projects.description: Sagara AI is generative text chat bot using Gemini API. Handle multi-turn conversation to manage context conversation between system and user. This project is requirements to pass Hacktiv8 Course Maju Bareng AI for Profesional Developer

projects.name: Langit Musik Lite
projects.description: Lite version of music streaming app, available for guest mode, free user and premium user with subscription. You can enjoy listen many indonesia songs in this platform

projects.name: Farmbyte Harvest

projects.name: Nuun
projects.description: Smart CCTV app for device connection & control. User can possible to connect their smart cctv from Tuya or JFTech SDK. Enable to auto detect SDK by CCTV details. Monitor and control device, also smart user motion detection notification

projects.name: My Jasindo
projects.description: Insurance app for subscription details for jasindo customers. Provide feature to see insurance detail coverage, beneficiary and subscription detail.
